paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant p.R25W, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Repeated cascade family screening for this variant was carried out for other family members, and it was detected in 7 of them (II.3, II.5, III.3, III.6, III.7, III.8, and III.9).

functional_data.summary: The p.R25W variant in KCNH2 is associated with a loss of function of the hERG channel.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was detected in 7 family members with BrS.
variants.additional_notes: The p.R25W variant was found in SCN5A-negative BrS patients.
key_quotes: A missense mutation p.R25W in KCNH2 has been found in SCN5A-negative BrS patient.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the KCNH2 variant was extracted successfully.
